Title: The Brownout
Writer: Tony Yacenda, Dan Perrault, Tony Yacenda (created by), Dan Perrault (created by)
Actors: Tyler Alvarez, Griffin Gluck, Travis Tope, Melvin Gregg
Plot: Peter and Sam travel to a prestigious private high school in Bellevue, Washington, to document the story of a filthy vandal called the "Turd Burglar."
